title: 1966 Devon Spaceway Interior Bed Layout Pics

posts.content:
D.S wrote:Thanks for your reply

I need to make the hinged part..

Dave


And just to cheer you up there are two variants
One where the 'legs' are made of welded steel rod, the other (later) where the legs are made from an alloy tube. Can't find the pics but they are on a thread somewhere.
Brian
